messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] harry potter
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 9/18/2000 9:50:43 PM Central Daylight Time, ... Sandra, with your love of role playing, these books would be right up your alley! Carron
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 9/18/2000 9:50:43 PM Central Daylight Time,
SandraDodd@... writes:

> We'll get them cheap at a garage sale sometime when all your kids are tired
> of them! <g>
>
> Sandra

Sandra, with your love of role playing, these books would be right up your
alley!

Carron

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] harry potter

<< You're not the only one, Marianne, me neither. But then mine are
only nearly-5 and 3&3/4, but I'm gonna get 'em soon... >>

We'll get them cheap at a garage sale sometime when all your kids are tired
of them! <g>

Sandra

messages.subject: harry potter
messages.msgSnippet: I must be the only person on this message board who has never read a book by harry potter, apart from my 12yr old daughter. guess where we are going tomorrow!
messages.messageBody:
I must be the only person on this message board who has never read a
book by harry potter, apart from my 12yr old daughter.
guess where we are going tomorrow!
Marianne
